column4: ok im trying to use vuze on 11.04 and it has installed and will open although it seems to be getting no internet connection ive done some research and it seems that it has built in antivirus im wondering if that is the problem
and wen i try to search nothing searches\
well i get internet connection with everything else
just for vuze it will not connect
transmission works fine aswell just no built in search function
ok i geuss no one has ne help for me
try a different torrent client to see if it connects also.
no, that is not the issue.
got a link for that? curious to see it.
try another client. transmission is installed by default. try that and see if it connects.
also might be worth reading this while you're at it. http://tinyurl.com/292e9g7
